title: Kai Ching Suen
description: College Student & Full Stack Web Developer
description_detail: I use Python, Java, React.js & Node.js
about_description: Hello! I am Kai. Nice to meet you. I am an International student from Hong Kong currently studying at New York. I've worked in serval companies as a intern devloper, including in game, software and full stack devlopments, and I am currently working remotely from Hong Kong as a partime software engineer. I love to design and code, and I love what I do!
name: Kai Ching Suen

Associate Science degree in Computer Science (Engineering Sequence)
